evaluation.Q1: Does the chart effectively compare average N, P, K values across different crops?

feedback.improvement: The grouped bar chart effectively shows N, P, K values for multiple crops
Consider sorting the crops by total nutrient value for easier comparison

evaluation.Q2: Are rice values highlighted with distinct colors that stand out from other crops?

feedback.improvement: Rice bars are colored red, blue, and red, making them distinct from other crops

evaluation.Q3: Are there clear text annotations for rice and wheat displaying their average N, P, K values?

feedback.improvement: Add text annotations showing N, P, K values for rice and wheat

evaluation.Q4: Is the chart easily interpretable by agricultural researchers, farmers, and crop scientists?

feedback.improvement: Clear labeling of crops and nutrient types
Add units for nutrient values to improve interpretability

evaluation.Q5: Does the chart allow for easy comparison between crops, especially rice and wheat?

feedback.improvement: Grouped bar chart format allows for easy comparison
Consider placing rice and wheat bars adjacent for easier direct comparison

evaluation.Q6: Are all crop data points clearly visible and not obscured?

feedback.improvement: All crop data points are visible without obstruction

evaluation.Q7: Is there a clear and informative title that accurately describes the visualization?

feedback.improvement: The title 'Average N, P, K Values for Different Crops' is clear and informative

evaluation.Q8: Are the axis labels (crop types and nutrient values) clear and easily readable?

feedback.improvement: Crop names on x-axis and nutrient values on y-axis are clear and readable
Consider rotating x-axis labels for better readability of longer crop names

evaluation.Q9: Does the color scheme used for non-rice and non-wheat crops enhance visual distinction without causing confusion?

feedback.improvement: Use a more diverse color palette for better distinction between crops
Consider using a consistent color scheme for N, P, K across all crops

evaluation.Q10: Is there sufficient spacing between bars for easy distinction of different crops?

feedback.improvement: Adequate spacing between grouped bars for each crop

evaluation.Q11: Does the scale of the Y-axis adequately capture the range of nutrient values?

feedback.improvement: Y-axis scale from 0 to 200 captures all nutrient values

evaluation.Q12: If present, does the legend clearly explain the color coding without interfering with the main chart area?

feedback.improvement: Legend clearly explains N, P, K color coding without interfering with the chart

evaluation.Q13: Is the font style and size consistent and legible across all text elements?

feedback.improvement: Consistent font style and size used throughout the chart

evaluation.Q14: If included, do grid lines enhance readability without cluttering the chart?

feedback.improvement: Horizontal grid lines enhance readability without cluttering

evaluation.Q15: Is the overall composition and balance of the chart visually appealing?

feedback.improvement: Overall layout is well-balanced and visually appealing
Consider adjusting the chart's aspect ratio for better use of space

evaluation.Q16: Are any technical terms or abbreviations used appropriate for the target audience?

feedback.improvement: N, P, K abbreviations are appropriate for the target audience

evaluation.Q17: Can trends or patterns in nutrient requirements be easily identified across crops?

feedback.improvement: Grouped bar format allows for easy identification of nutrient patterns
Consider sorting crops by a specific nutrient to highlight trends

evaluation.Q18: Is there any additional descriptive text that helps explain the purpose of the chart?

feedback.improvement: Include a brief description or subtitle explaining the chart's purpose

evaluation.Q19: Are less important data points appropriately de-emphasized to maintain focus on key information?

feedback.improvement: Consider using muted colors for crops other than rice and wheat to emphasize key crops

evaluation.Q20: Does the chart maintain its clarity and readability when viewed from a distance?

feedback.improvement: Overall layout and font sizes should maintain readability from a distance
Consider increasing the size of the legend for better visibility from afar
